tier.item: Subalit maaari umano itong lumampas ng tatlong araw habang hinihintay ang pagdating ng
iba pang kamag-anak nina Echegaray mula sa bicol.
'But this way it could possibly exceed (penetrate beyond limit) three days while waiting for
fetching yet other family members who are Echegaray from Bicol.'
(1) Subalit maaari umano itong lumampas ng tatlong araw habang hinihintay ang pagdating ng
iba pang kamag-anak nina Echegaray mula sa bicol.
'But this way it could possibly exceed (penetrate beyond limit) three days while waiting for
fetching yet other family members who are Echegaray from Bicol.'
Subalit maaari umano itong lumampas ng tatlong araw habang hinihintay ang pagdating ng iba pang kamag-anak nina Echegaray mula sa bicol.
But this way it could possibly exceed (penetrate beyond limit) three days while waiting for fetching yet other family members who are Echegaray from Bicol.

"Kapag natapos na ang ating paghirirap sa Pebrero 5 sa madilim na lugar na ito, sa Pebrero
6, siguro ay mas maganda na ang ating buhay," dagdag pa niya.
'"When our troubles are over on February 5 in this dark place, on February 6, maybe our life
will be better," she added.'

Sa kabilang dako, tumanggi ang Pangulo sa alok ng MILF leader na si Hashim Salamat na
gawin an kanilang one-on-one talks sa Camp Abubakar Assiduque sa Matanog, Maguindanao.
'On the other side, the President refused the offer of MILF leader Hashim Salamat to hold
their one-on-one talks at Camp Abubakar Assiduque sa Matanog, Maguindanao.'
(4) Sa kabilang dako, tumanggi ang Pangulo sa alok ng MILF leader na si Hashim Salamat na
gawin an kanilang one-on-one talks sa Camp Abubakar Assiduque sa Matanog, Maguindanao.
'On the other side, the President refused the offer of MILF leader Hashim Salamat to hold
their one-on-one talks at Camp Abubakar Assiduque sa Matanog, Maguindanao.'
Sa kabilang dako, tumanggi ang Pangulo sa alok ng MILF leader na si Hashim Salamat na gawin an kanilang one-on-one talks sa Camp Abubakar Assiduque sa Matanog, Maguindanao.
On the other side, the President refused the offer of MILF leader Hashim Salamat to hold their one-on-one talks at Camp Abubakar Assiduque sa Matanog, Maguindanao.

tier.item: Magkakaroon ng Estrada-Salamat summit at ito'y isasagawa sa pagitan ng mga miyembro ng
MILF central committee at ni Robert Aventajado, presidential adviser on flaship (sic) projects.
'They would be having the Estrada-Salamat summit and this would be done at the time by
members of MILF central committee and by Robert Aventajado, presidential adviser on flaship
(sic) projects.'

Kamakalawa ay bumalangkas na ang Pangulo at si government chief negotiator ambassador
Manuel Yan ng bagong pamamaraan upang maging matagumpay ang peace process.
'On the day after tomorrow the President and government chief negotiator Ambassador Manuel
Yan will outline already a new way for the peace process to become successful.'

tier.item: Sa ilalim ng panukala ni Rep. Pancho, ang isang beterano na yumao na o hindi na
nakakalakad ay maaa-ring (sic) ipasa ang kanyang American citizenship sa kanyang mga anak
o mga apo.
'Under the proposition of Rep. Pancho, a veteran who left or could not walk (work?) might
pass over his American citizenship to his children or grandchildren.'
(9) Sa ilalim ng panukala ni Rep. Pancho, ang isang beterano na yumao na o hindi na
nakakalakad ay maaa-ring (sic) ipasa ang kanyang American citizenship sa kanyang mga anak
o mga apo.
'Under the proposition of Rep. Pancho, a veteran who left or could not walk (work?) might
pass over his American citizenship to his children or grandchildren.'
Sa ilalim ng panukala ni Rep. Pancho, ang isang beterano na yumao na o hindi na nakakalakad ay maaa-ring (sic) ipasa ang kanyang American citizenship sa kanyang mga anak o mga apo.
Under the proposition of Rep. Pancho, a veteran who left or could not walk (work?) might pass over his American citizenship to his children or grandchildren.

tier.item: (10) May mga pagbabago sa timeslot ng mga panghapong programa ng ABS-CBN Channel 2 dahil
sa pagpasok ng bagong soap operang Marinella na pinagbibidahan nina Serene Dalrymple,
Camille Pratts at Shaina Magdayao.
"There are new items in the timeslot of the afternoon program of ABS-CBN Channel 2 because
of the insertion of the new soap opera Marinella starring Serene Dalrymple, Camille Pratts and
Shaina Magdayao."

sa pagpasok ng bagong soap operang Marinella na pinagbibidahan nina Serene Dalrymple,
Camille Pratts at Shaina Magdayao.
"There are new items in the timeslot of the afternoon program of ABS-CBN Channel 2 because
of the insertion of the new soap opera Marinella starring Serene Dalrymple, Camille Pratts and
Shaina Magdayao."

tier.item: (13) Katapat ng Buble (sic) Gang ang Super Laff-In and based on the latest survey, malaki talaga

Ilang beses ko na hong inulit yung papel ko tagilid pa rin ako.
I have changed my paper so many times, however I am still sidewise.
(52) galante siya sa mga taong malapit sa kanya
'she is very generous to those people who are close to her'

'she is very generous to those people who are close to her'

(53) Sumabit ako sa papel ko, eh.
'I am caught [hanging] on this paper, eh.'

'I am caught [hanging] on this paper, eh.'
Sumabit ako sa papel ko, eh.
I am caught [hanging] on this paper, eh.
(54) (daming kalokohan pero napagtatakpan)
'a lot of scams, but you cover it up'

'a lot of scams, but you cover it up'
(daming kalokohan pero napagtatakpan)
a lot of scams, but you cover it up
(55) abutin man ng umaga lahat ay gagawin ...
'even if morning comes, I'll do everything ...'
